institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 25 (subsidy implementation matters)
contents: Article 25 (Subsidy Implementation Matters) ① Supporting companies must implement the following matters for transparent and efficient execution of project expenses., 1. Project expenses such as support funds, company contributions, and interest income must be used only for business purposes. , 2. Among the types of support that require corporate out-of-pocket expenses, if the out-of-pocket contribution is not fulfilled, part or all of the support fund must be returned according to the percentage of non-fulfillment., 3. 「Value-Added Tax Act」 arising from the use of subsidy and self-contribution. Value-added tax (hereinafter referred to as *Value-Added Tax) must be borne as a separate company's own expense that is not included in the self-payment under subparagraph 2. 4. Manage business expenses with a separate dedicated bank account in the name of the supporting company, and pay business expenses with a dedicated card. must be executed., 5. Project expenses must be managed using the subsidy management system designated by the Corporation., 6. When executing project expenses, regular receipts such as sales slips from dedicated cards must be received., 7. Income of project expenses A separate accounting ledger containing expenditure details must be kept and accounting management must be maintained, and accounting-related supporting documents must be kept in accordance with Article 116 of the Corporate Tax Act and Article 23-2 of the Worker Vocational Competency Development Act and upon request by the Corporation. It must be submitted., 8. In case of reasons such as business interruption before the end of the business period, the support money paid must be returned in cash., 9. If the support money generates profit such as interest on deposits, it must be used only for business purposes, and the rest must be settled. ② Detailed execution standards for project expenses and support funds shall be separately determined by the chairman.
